data.title: Eyemart Optical Outlet in IA
data.meta_description: Learn about accepted vision insurance & financing options at Eyemart Optical Outlet in central Iowa. Call us today with any questions!
data.text:
Insurance at Eyemart Optical Outlet

At Eyemart Optical Outlet, we know that insurance can sometimes be confusing. We want to make sure that your experience with us goes as smoothly as possible. That’s why we’re proud to accept many different insurance carriers — because we don’t feel that anything should stand in the way of affordable eye care.

What Vision Insurance Can Do for You

Typically, your vision benefits include a discount or allowance for you to see an eye doctor for a check-up every year. You may also be offered a deal on corrective lenses, whether that includes glasses, contact lenses, or both. Our staff at Eyemart can assist you with any specifics if you need help understanding your insurance benefits and show you how you can get the most out of your vision insurance.

Providing You With Quality Glasses for the Best Price on the Market

Insurance Accepted at Eyemart Optical Outlet

We’re proud to accept the following insurances to help pay for our products and services.

Avesis

Blue Cross Blue Shield (Wellmark)

Coast to Coast

Davis Vision

Eye Med

Spectera

Superior Vision

VBA

VSP (as a preferred provider)

We also accept Medicare and Medicaid!

If you do not see your plan listed, or have further questions, please contact us to see how we can help.

Other Eligible Insurance Options

Some people choose to have a Flexible Spending Account (FSA) or a Health Savings Account (HSA) to help cover their health care needs with pre-tax money over the course of the year, including vision care — eye exams, glasses, contact lenses, lens upgrades, and accessories. We accept HSA and FSA dollars as payment at Eyemart Optical Outlet and are happy to help you use your accounts on your eye health.

Schedule an Appointment at Eyemart!

There’s no better place to take care of your eye health needs. Call one of our 8 Eyemart Optical Outlet locations or fill out our convenient online form to schedule your appointment today!
